title: RBI imposes penalties on BoM, Hinduja Leyland Finance, Poonawalla Fincorp
description: RBI penalized Bank of Maharashtra with Rs 1.27 crore for breaching directives like Know Your Customer. Hinduja Leyland Finance Ltd faced a Rs 4.90 lakh penalty for similar violations, while Poonawalla Fincorp Ltd was fined Rs 10 lakh for charging interest on loans before disbursement, violating loan terms.
